title: XDM Business Opportunity Details
description: This mixin is used to capture and maintain additional opportunity attributes that are used by industry crm systems.

opportunityOwnerID.title: opportunity Owner Id
opportunityOwnerID.description: Unique ID of the internal owner for this opportunity.

campaignID.title: Campaign ID
campaignID.description: Unique ID of the campaign related to this opportunity.

fiscalYear.title: Fiscal Year
fiscalYear.description: The fiscal year this opportunity is targeted for.

fiscalQuarter.title: Fiscal Quarter
fiscalQuarter.description: The fiscal quarter this opportunity is targeted for.

forecastCategory.title: Forecast Category
forecastCategory.description: Forecast category for the opportunity based on the opportunity stage.

forecastCategoryName.title: Forecast Category Name
forecastCategoryName.description: Name of the forecast category for the opportunity.

isClosed.title: Closed Flag
isClosed.description: Boolean indicating if the opportunity is closed.

isWon.title: Won Flag
isWon.description: Boolean indicating if the opportunity was won.

probabilityPercentage.title: Probability Percentage
probabilityPercentage.description: Probability as a percentage that the opportunity will be closed, represented as a number between 0 and 1.

opportunityAmount.title: Opportunity Amount
opportunityAmount.description: Estimated sale amount for the opportunity.

expectedRevenue.title: Expected Revenue
expectedRevenue.description: Expected revenue based on the probability percentage and opportunity amount.

opportunityQuantity.title: Opportunity Quantity
opportunityQuantity.description: Total quantity of all related products for the opportunity.

expectedCloseDate.title: Expected Close Date
expectedCloseDate.description: Expected date the opportunity will close.

actualCloseDate.title: Actual Close Date
actualCloseDate.description: Actual date the opportunity was closed.

lastActivityDate.title: Last Activity Date
lastActivityDate.description: Date of last activity for the opportunity.

leadSource.title: Lead Source
leadSource.description: Source that the opportunity originated from.

nextStep.title: Next Step
nextStep.description: Description of the next step for the opportunity.
